Sign up setFirstname(e.target.value)} /> setLastname(e.target.value)} /> {emailValid ? ( setEmail(e.target.value)} /> ) : ( setEmail(e.target.value)} /> )} setUsername(e.target.value)} /> {passwordMatch ? ( setPasswordRepeat(e.target.value)} /> ) : ( setPasswordRepeat(e.target.value)} /> )} } label="I agree to the privacy policy and receive updates via email." /> Already have an account? Sign in
); }; export default AddNewGame;
